DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the performance and safety of the InterGard Synergy vascular graft.
DOC.detailed_description: Study of the device in patients with aneurysmal and occlusive disease of the abdominal aorta and peripheral arteries.
DOC.criteria: Patients requiring an InterGard Synergy Vascular Graft Patients with contraindications per InterGard Synergy Vascular Graft Patients with current graft infection Patients with a known allergy to collagen, triclosan or silver acetate Patients who require urgent or emergent surgery
